agentDescription: Detects generated package method calls that do not exist in the installed package version. Use this when task intent aligns with tags: core, process, preset, quality, dependencies, agentic. Use this construction when an agent task matches hallucinated api detector workflows and the team needs a repeatable, typed analysis contract. It cannot replace full runtime verification and does not guarantee correctness outside the provided input and capability constraints.
